title: Best of The Herd for 06/12/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for 06/12/2019
description:
Colin defends Kevin Durant for playing hurt because those are the moments we remember in sports and we criticize player who don't play when injured. He says the US Women's National team has nothing to apologize for after a 13-0 win. Plus, FS1's Nick Wright talks about NBA free agency and why this injury to KD won't keep him out of New York next season.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
